channel.title: General Concepts on Houdini Guides
channel.description: Recent content in General Concepts on Houdini Guides

item.title: Interface Layout
item.description: Interface Layout .hg-pill--red { color: white; background: #cc0425; font-size: 10px; display: inline-block; padding: 4px 9px; margin-left: 0em; margin-top: 2em; margin-bottom: 1em; text-transform: uppercase; border-radius: 5px; vertical-align: baseline; position: relative; top: -3px; } .hg-pill--orange { color: white; background: #ff6554; font-size: 10px; display: inline-block; padding: 4px 9px; margin-left: 0em; margin-top: 2em; margin-bottom: 1em; text-transform: uppercase; border-radius: 5px; vertical-align: baseline; position: relative; top: -3px; } .hg-pill--green { color: black; background: #36ffce; font-size: 10px; display: inline-block; padding: 4px 9px; margin-left: 0em; margin-top: 2em; margin-bottom: 1em; text-transform: uppercase; border-radius: 5px; vertical-align: baseline; position: relative; top: -3px; } .
